note.p: Daughter of John Charles Conybeare and his wife Katherine Mary Vansittart. Married Arthur Henry Craven in 1896.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/931/21/34)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 February 2017)
Glamorganshire, Wales, Anglican baptisms, marriages and burials, 1570–1994 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 November 2022)
